attributes.action: Change the status of Child Benefit from Universal to Means Tested
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that Child Benefit should be available to those who really need it - low and middle income families.
A family on a combined income of £70,000 for example, don't need child benefit whereas a family on a combined income of £15,000 for example do need it and possibly an increase in child benefit.
Please sign this petition and pave the way for benefit reform!
